Diary of Lydia:
The Dark Deeps

Starlight reflected in his smile.
He speaks of the courage, but I do not even know where and who I am!
Maybe crazy man can be brave? Who knows?
His laughter is heard, and again, the word courage. Other words, but they are in another language, I do not understand.
Dark Magician with his smile speaks softly to me, holding my hand in the dark night.
Audacity. Audacity. Audacity. Nothing else matters.
My ceremony still qualify! What is going on here so late?
Turn the page.
